sys_script.name: Datetime Validation for Car Reservations

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_aaeb50f697d60110002ffef3a253afdc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_616811_car_renta_scheduled_reservations</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Datetime Validation for Car Reservations</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// rightnow stores the current time
    var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
    // Create a GlideDateTime object for the Start Datetime
    var startRental = new GlideDateTime(current.start_datetime);
  
  // If the start_datetime is before rightnow, do not write the record to the database, output an error message
  if(startRental.before(rightnow)){
    gs.addErrorMessage("Start Datetime cannot be in the past.  Your record has not been saved to the database.");
    current.setAbortAction(true);
  }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-21 07:11:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aaeb50f697d60110002ffef3a253afdc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Datetime Validation for Car Reservations</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car Rental Reservation" source="x_616811_car_renta">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Rental Reservation">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aaeb50f697d60110002ffef3a253afdc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-23 01:48:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aaeb50f697d60110002ffef3a253afdc"/></record_update>
